<h3 id="X38186">X(38186) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(6), X(7), X(9)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-3*(b+c)*a^3+2*(b-c)^2*a^2-(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a+(b^2+c^2)*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38186) = X(6)+2*X(142) = X(7)+5*X(3618) = X(9)-4*X(3589) = 2*X(141)-5*X(20195) = 2*X(182)+X(5805) = 2*X(597)+X(6173) = 2*X(1386)+X(2550) = X(3416)-4*X(3826) = 2*X(5480)+X(5732) = 5*X(12017)+X(31671) = 2*X(18583)+X(31657) = 4*X(19130)-X(31672) = 2*X(38046)+X(38190) = X(38048)+2*X(38187) = 2*X(38086)+X(38088) = 2*X(38115)+X(38145) = X(38117)+2*X(38164)</b>
<p>X(38186) lies on these lines: {1,16593}, {2,210}, {6,142}, {7,3618}, {9,3589}, {141,16832}, {144,17383}, {182,5805}, {511,38122}, {516,5085}, {524,38093}, {527,38086}, {528,38023}, {597,4795}, {673,1492}, {971,14561}, {1001,17023}, {1086,36404}, {1386,2550}, {1503,38150}, {2801,38197}, {2886,24600}, {2999,10383}, {3242,29571}, {3243,17284}, {3306,26007}, {3416,3826}, {3564,38171}, {3751,31183}, {5050,38107}, {5480,5732}, {5542,31191}, {5762,38110}, {5843,38166}, {5846,16833}, {5847,38204}, {5848,38205}, {5849,38206}, {5850,38194}, {5851,38195}, {5852,38196}, {5853,38185}, {5856,38188}, {5857,38189}, {6600,21526}, {8732,24471}, {9053,29573}, {11019,30825}, {11025,28757}, {11376,26964}, {12017,31671}, {14848,38065}, {14853,21151}, {15570,17316}, {16475,38052}, {16972,17366}, {16973,17245}, {17244,32029}, {17322,18230}, {17609,28740}, {18583,31657}, {19130,31672}, {19512,20330}, {22769,37272}, {24393,29604}</p>
<p>
X(38186) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {5050, 38107}, {5085, 38143}, {14561, 38115}, {14848, 38065}, {14853, 21151}, {16475, 38052}, {38046, 38047}, {38049, 38187}, {38110, 38164}<br>
X(38186) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (38048, 38049), (38117, 38110), (38145, 14561), (38190, 38047)<br>
</p>
